name: Grumpy Stags: RoboHop
description:
Mario-themed game made in one week!

Controls

  • WASD/ARROWS -> MOVE
  • SPACE/W/UP -> JUMP
  • S/DOWN -> CROUCH
  • ESC -> Return to main menu
  • Tap and hold space after jumping to grapple

Credits

  • Kian Bennett - Programming
  • Elliot Jermy - Art/Level Design
  • Kieryn Ashwell - Programming/Sound/Design
  • Петко Миков - Art/Design
